mapper.select: SELECT COUNT( * ) as COUNT FROM BOARD

/* 공통게시판 리스트 조회 */ SELECT BOARD_IDX, BOARD_TYPE, TITLE, CONTENT, CONTENT_TYPE, READ_CNT, OPEN_DT, CLOSE_DT, HTML_YN, USE_YN, DEL_YN, WRITE_NM, WRITE_HP, WRITE_EMAIL, ORDERER_DATE_TIME, ORDER_NO, REG_DTTM, REG_USERID, UPD_DTTM, UPD_USERID, USR_ID, CMPLX_ID FROM BOARD WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND DEL_YN = 'N' LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT BOARD_IDX, BOARD_TYPE, TITLE, CONTENT, CONTENT_TYPE, READ_CNT, OPEN_DT, CLOSE_DT, HTML_YN, USE_YN, DEL_YN, WRITE_NM, WRITE_HP, WRITE_EMAIL, ORDERER_DATE_TIME, ORDER_NO, REG_DTTM, REG_USERID, UPD_DTTM, UPD_USERID, USR_ID, CMPLX_ID FROM BOARD WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND BOARD_IDX = #{boardIdx}

SELECT BOARD_IDX, BOARD_TYPE, TITLE, CONTENT, CONTENT_TYPE, READ_CNT, OPEN_DT, CLOSE_DT, HTML_YN, USE_YN, DEL_YN, WRITE_NM, WRITE_HP, WRITE_EMAIL, ORDERER_DATE_TIME, ORDER_NO, REG_DTTM, REG_USERID, UPD_DTTM, UPD_USERID, USR_ID, CMPLX_ID FROM BOARD WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND BOARD_IDX = LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_TYPE, TITLE, CONTENT, USR_ID, CMPLX_ID, REG_DTTM, UPD_DTTM ) VALUES ( #{boardType}, #{title}, #{content}, #{usrId}, 0, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
